CustomField.description: Used to define the actual amount spent for the meeting to allow comparison between Requested Amount and Actual one. Calculates a total based on the sum of Actual Amount Used in Unit/Group Cost records
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to define the actual amount spent for the meeting to allow comparison between Requested Amount and Actual one. Calculates a total based on the sum of Actual Amount Used in Unit/Group Cost records
CustomField.label: Actual Amount Used
